alert.note: Alert for Crittenden; Mississippi; Poinsett (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 6:47PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Poinsett, southwestern Mississippi, northeastern Crittenden and southwestern Tipton Counties through 715 PM CDT... At 646 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Marked Tree, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Marked Tree, Lepanto, Tyronza, Joiner, Gilmore, Bassett, Jericho, Turrell, Clarkedale, Birdsong, Payneway, Whitton, Dimple, Tulot, Deckerville, Menesha, Dub, Chelford, Alto and Denwood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for eastern Arkansas...and west Tennessee.
